[phylogenetictree](http://github.com/zachcp/phylogenetictree) is an [htmlwidget](https://github.com/ramnathv/htmlwidgets)
 JavaScript/D3 chart library.

## Installation

`devtools::install_github("zachcp/quickd3map")`

## Usage

```{r setup, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(collapse = TRUE, comment = "#>")
options(dplyr.print_min = 4L, dplyr.print_max = 4L)
library(phylogenetictree)
```

The `phylogenetictree` pacakge is an [htmlwidget](http://www.htmlwidgets.org/) that is based on the [D3.js](http://d3js.org/) JavaScript library. phylogenetictree is a near-clone of Mike Bostock's [tree of life](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/c034d66572fd6bd6815a)


## Making a Tree

```{r }
library(phylogenetictree)

phylogenetictree(lifetree)
```
